Description:
About Tekrevol:Tekrevol is a leading mobile app development company dedicated to providing businesses with reliable technological solutions. We have helped countless entrepreneurs achieve their goals and drive results by creating top rated mobile apps and websites.As a global company, our aim isn’t just to create digital solutions but to help businesses achieve sustainable growth and scalability. Our teams and networks stretch across the United States and have extended its reach to Ukraine & the Middle East.Job Description:We are looking for a mid-level UX/UI designer to join our team and help us create amazing user experiences for our products. The ideal candidate will have experience working on mobile, web, and websites. They will be responsible for:Conducting user research
Designing wireframes and prototypes
Creating high-fidelity mockups
Collaborating with developers and product managers.Requirement:Bachelor's degree or a certification in interaction design, or a related field.
Minimum 3 years of experience in UX/UI design.
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles.
Experience with wireframing, prototyping, and high-fidelity mockups.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe Creative Suite, and other prototyping tools.Shift Timings: Morning (10:30 a.m. – 07:30 p.m.)Job Details
